p: To confirm the statistical significance of the obtained results, a permutation test was used. The histogram of two sets of classification (with real and permuted labels) is shown in Figure 7. The Mannâ€“Whitney U test [ 50] was used as a nonparametric test for equality of population medians of the two samples. The result rejects the null hypothesis at the 1% significance level. So, they are meaningfully different.
